release.change: New: Experimental option to prevent Doze from exiting on movement (root/Xposed not required)
New: New broadcast (com.suyashsrijan.forcedoze.CHANGE_SETTING) to allow you to change ForceDoze settings via Tasker
New: Added the ability to see all supported Tasker-compatible broadcasts and the values you need to pass (if applicable). To see, go to Settings -> Tasker broadcasts
Changed: Updates to ForceDozeService to make it more reliable
Changed: Ability to turn off mobile data on Doze is no longer available if you're not rooted, because root is required for it
